ta.title: தோட்ட மக்களுக்கு ஒரு கூட்டம்
body_lines: தோட்டத் தொழிலாளர்களில் தொழிலாளர் மக்களுக்கு 10,000 வீடுகளை நிர்மாணிப்பதற்கான ஜனாதிபதி செயலகத்தின் ஜனாதிபதி செயலகத்தில் இந்த நிகழ்வு நடைபெற்றது.
මෙම අවස්ථාවට ජනාධිපති රනිල් වික්‍රමසිංහ මහතා සමඟ ඉන්දීය මහ කොමසාරිස් සන්තෝෂ් ජා මහතා ද මාර්ගගත ක්‍රමවේදය ඔස්සේ සම්බන්ධ වූහ.

en.title: A gathering to the people of the plantation
body_lines: The event was held at the Presidential Secretariat in the Presidential Secretariat for the construction of 10,000 houses for the labor people in the plantation workers.
In the fourth phase, 1300 houses will be constructed for 45 districts.
Indian High Commissioner Sanarithshy with President Ranil Wickremesinghe was also involved in the online method.

summary_lines: A gathering at the Presidential Secretariat announced the construction of 10,000 houses for plantation workers, with 1300 houses in the fourth phase for 45 districts, involving Indian High Commissioner Sanarithshy and President Ranil Wickremesinghe in an online method.
